mapper.update: update b_approve_club_activity set approve_user_id = #{approveUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_approve = #{isApprove,jdbcType=INTEGER}, form_id = #{formId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lv = #{lv,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
